Posts.Content: lately i've been noticing purple splotches (so far i've seen 2, the first one went away, the second one I just noticed today) and I have to know... is this a symptom of any kind of cancer? breast? skin?
Posts.Title: NEED ADVICE

Posts.Content: Hi, those are both symptoms of breast cancer, I suggest that you consult your doctor. but the chances are very slim that you have it at your age... at age 30 you have a 1 in 5,900 chance of having breast cancer, so at age 14 I SERIOUSLY doubt it
Posts.Title: think i might have breast cancer.
